insiderBenefits.insiderBenefits:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Insider Benefits section
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section header
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Insider Benefits section of settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Insider Benefits"
insiderBenefits.hideWebsiteAdverts:
**Functional Purpose**: Checkbox label to hide website adverts
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section
**When Users See This**: If the user is an Insider, they can opt to hide website adverts
**Technical Context**: This option is disabled if the user is not an Insider
**Current English**: "Hide website adverts"
insiderBenefits.changePreferences:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit changes to Insider preferences
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section footer
**When Users See This**: After making changes to preferences, or upon loading if they are an Insider
**Technical Context**: Button is disabled if the user is not an Insider
**Current English**: "Change preferences"
insiderBenefits.preferencesUpdated:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message after updating Insider preferences
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section, below the change preferences button
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully updating preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard success message, displayed with a checkmark icon
**Current English**: "Your preferences have been updated"
insiderBenefits.thanksForBeingInsider:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message for active Insiders
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section, below the heading
**When Users See This**: When an active Insider views the Insider Benefits section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Thanks for being an Exercism Insider! Here are some extra settings exclusively for you."
insiderBenefits.exclusiveOptions:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message explaining that these are exclusive Insider options
**UI Location**: Settings page, Insider Benefits section, below the heading
**When Users See This**: When a user who is not an Insider views the Insider Benefits section (and is not eligible to join)
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "These are exclusive options for Exercism Insiders. "
